**********
CRDT Agent
**********

This agent substitutes the `PCIE_CRDT_LOGIC <https://gitlab.liberouter.org/ndk/ndk-core/-/blob/main/intel/src/comp/pcie/comp/pcie_crdt/pcie_crdt_logic.vhd>`_ component.
